description: Tree works in Conservation Area.4 Limes in front of 2 4 6 & 6A  Grange Grove  N1.2 Limes rear of 6 and 6A Grange Grove.Works:-Front of properties at 2 Grange Grove and 4 Grange Grove- Clear branches overhanging Pavement and Reduce height by one third and thin by 25%; 6 & 6A Grange Grove - Reduce height by one third  clean up lower branches.Thin by 25% and reshape. Rear of property at 6 Grange Grove - Reduce trunk to damaged fork and reduce spread of remaining crown to balance;6A Grange Grove - Reduce height by 8'-10'. Lift lower branches.Thin by 20%.Deadwood and shapen the crown.
decision_conditions: To protect the health and stability of trees to be retained on the site, and to ensure that a satisfactory standard of visual amenity is provided and maintained.
